item.title: Obj-C 中的重载与重写
item.description: Date Platform 2019-03-20 macOS 10.14.2 Preface 重载（Overload）和重写（Override）是面向对象语言中十分基本的两个概念，本文将谈谈 Obj-C 中的重载与重写。 重载 In some programming languages, function overloading or method overloading is the ability to create multiple functions of the same name with different implementations. Calls to an overloaded function will run a specific implementation of that function appropriate to the context of the call, allowing one function call to perform different tasks depending on context.
